all-modules.title: Action Pack
all-modules.description: Adds an expanding tray for using an actor's items, abilities and spells

all-modules.title: Library: Active effect manager
all-modules.description: Active effect manager library for leverage operation on active effects

all-modules.title: Active-Auras
all-modules.description: Active-Auras

all-modules.title: Advanced Macros
all-modules.description: Use handlebars templating, recursive macro calls and call macros with arguments or directly from chat.

all-modules.title: Active Token Effects
all-modules.description: Active Token Effects

all-modules.title: Automated Animations
all-modules.description: This will automatically run most JB2A Animations such as Melee/Ranged Attacks, Spell Attacks, and Instant Spells

all-modules.title: Autocomplete Inline Properties
all-modules.description: Add inline property autocompletion for fields that can use inline properties or otherwise reference document data.

all-modules.title: Auto-Rotate
all-modules.description: Allows tokens to automatically rotate based on movement, targeting, etc.

all-modules.title: Better Roofs
all-modules.description: Vision enhancements for roofs

all-modules.title: Caeora's Patreon Maps, Tokens, and Assets
all-modules.description: This module features a fantastic library of all of the maps, tokens, and props created by Caeora. You will find mysterious and evocative battlemaps, hundreds of beautifully drawn top-down creature tokens, and a collection of detailed props which can be placed as tile assets within your Scenes. All of the battlemaps are pre-configured with walls, lighting, and ambient audio sources. This module also offers an optional setting which can automatically apply Caeora's monster token artwork when importing creatures from the Monsters compendium pack in the dnd5e system.

all-modules.title: Cleaner sheet title bar
all-modules.description: This module remove text from actions in cluttered sheet title bar. Text still available on mouse hover. Work with all systems and all modules!

all-modules.title: lib - Color Settings
all-modules.description: Library that allows modules to add color settings and forms.

all-modules.title: Compendium Folders
all-modules.description: Collapsable folders for compendiums

all-modules.title: Cozy Maps - Free
all-modules.description: This module provides you with sample of free maps created by Cozy Maps. If you like these maps, please check out Cozy Maps on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/CozyMaps

all-modules.title: Custom Token Animations
all-modules.description: Custom Token Animations

all-modules.title: Dynamic effects using Active Effects
all-modules.description: replacement for dynamic effects

all-modules.title: Universal Battlemap Importer
all-modules.description: Imports scene elements from Universal VTT files generated by editors like DungeonFog and Dungeondraft

all-modules.title: D&D Beyond Importer
all-modules.description: Import your dndbeyond.com characters, spells, items, monsters, encounters, and adventures!

all-modules.title: DF Architect
all-modules.description: Architect for FoundryVTT provides a major overhaul of the Walls and Lighting features, as well as a few extra fun things like the Colour Picker and Alternate Grid Snap.

all-modules.title: DF Chat Enhancements
all-modules.description: Various enhancements to the chat features.

all-modules.title: DF Quality of Life
all-modules.description: A set of various small Quality of Life changes that don't quite fit in my other larger modules.

all-modules.title: DF Template Enhancements
all-modules.description: Enhanced templates for different types of grid targetting.

all-modules.title: DFreds Convenient Effects
all-modules.description: Adds easy to use toggleable active effects for common use cases

all-modules.title: DFreds Effects Panel
all-modules.description: A FoundryVTT module that adds a panel of active effects for the selected tokens.

all-modules.title: DFreds Pocket Change
all-modules.description: Automatically adds money to NPC character sheets when dropped on the canvas based on the DMG's individual treasures table. This is best used with Loot Sheet NPC 5e.

all-modules.title: Dice So Nice!
all-modules.description: Adds customizable 3D dice to Foundry VTT with lots of options to fit your playstyle.

all-modules.title: Drag Ruler
all-modules.description: When dragging a token displays a ruler showing how far you've moved that token.

all-modules.title: Drag'n'Transfer
all-modules.description: Move (rather than copy) items drag-and-dropped between character sheets.

all-modules.title: Dynamic Active Effects SRD
all-modules.description: DnD 5e SRD items, features and spells configured for Dynamic Active Effects, MQoL and AT

all-modules.title: DnD5e Drag Ruler Integration
all-modules.description: An enhancement of Drag Ruler for the DnD5e system.

all-modules.title: Enhanced Terrain Layer
all-modules.description: A base module that adds a Terrain Layer to Foundry.  Used as a library for Rulers and other modules

all-modules.title: Ernie's Modern UI
all-modules.description: A visual update for Foundry VTT UI.

all-modules.title: Forgotten Adventures Battlemaps
all-modules.description:
This Module contains battlemaps from Forgotten Adventures, fully integrated for use with Foundry VTT. Featuring extra capabilities using Monk's Active Tile Triggers and Tagger for truly dynamic scenes!

You can support the creation of our battlemaps on Patreon!

A gallery of our work can be found on the website.

Join our Discord server for any further questions.

all-modules.title: Forien's Unidentified Items
all-modules.description: Provides system agnostic solution to handle unidentified items and their identification.

all-modules.title: Show Notes
all-modules.description: Always show notes on the map.

all-modules.title: Simple Calendar
all-modules.description: A simple calendar module for keeping track of game days and events.

all-modules.title: Foundry Community Macros
all-modules.description:
This is a collection of Macros added by the FoundryVTT Community!

You can add your own macros by making a pull request here: https://github.com/foundry-vtt-community/macros

all-modules.title: Loot Tavern Free Item Compendium
all-modules.description:
A collection of ready-to-use beautifully illustrated Magic items from the Loot Tavern.

This compilation contains all 20+ themes from Loot Tavern, each containing 2 items each.

Make browsing and sorting the themes easier with the Compendium Folders and Compendium Browser modules.

all-modules.title: FXMaster
all-modules.description: Adds various particle and filter effects

all-modules.title: Health Estimate
all-modules.description: Gives players ability to see approximate health status of a token

all-modules.title: Inventory+
all-modules.description: Enhances the default dnd5e sheets inventory to allow for reorganization

all-modules.title: Item Piles
all-modules.description: This module adds the ability for items to be dropped onto the ground, and then picked up.

all-modules.title: Item Macro
all-modules.description: A module that allows macros to be stored in items and executed in various places.

all-modules.title: Ivan Duch's Music Packs
all-modules.description: A collection of my free fantasy music library. You can learn more about it at https://ivanduch.com.

all-modules.title: JB2A - Patreon Complete Collection
all-modules.description:
Animated Assets for spells, tiles, tokens, melee and ranged attacks

Troubleshooting and FAQ section on our website

Join our Discord server for any further questions

Preview our assets

Thank you for the support ! ❤️

all-modules.title: Less Fog
all-modules.description: This module allows adjustments to the appearance of the FOW.

all-modules.title: Levels
all-modules.description: Add multiple vertical levels to maps

all-modules.title: Library: DF Hotkeys
all-modules.description: Library for providing a way for modules to register keyboard shortcuts

all-modules.title: lib Themer
all-modules.description: One stop shop for styling Foundry

all-modules.title: libWrapper
all-modules.description: Library for wrapping core Foundry VTT methods, meant to improve compatibility between packages that wrap the same methods.

all-modules.title: Lock View
all-modules.description: Locks the view of players by enabling the GM to block zooming and panning. The module also gives control over the player view, allowing the GM to zoom and pan. Developed for the purpose of play on a digital playmat, such as a horizontally mounted TV, and for that purpose the module can scale the scene so the gridsize is always displayed corresponding to a real-world size.

all-modules.title: Magic Items
all-modules.description: Module that adds the ability to create magical items with spells or feats that belong to the item itself, such as staffs or magic wands, which will be automatically inherited from the character who owns the item.

all-modules.title: Module Compatibility Checker
all-modules.description: Check your module list for compatibility with the latest major version of Foundry VTT.

all-modules.title: Michael Ghelfi Studios Audio Pack
all-modules.description: An official audio pack of professional quality ambience and music from ENNIES-awarded composer Michael Ghelfi & composer Filip Melvan. The sounds come from the greatest library of ambient sounds for TTRPGs and include 38 immersive ambiences and 17 memorable musical scores from our albums and Patreon. We have more than a thousand sounds to download on our website and Patreon. We have generous conditions for Streamers, Podcasters and content creators.

all-modules.title: Midi QOL
all-modules.description: Automates rolling weapon/spell attacks and applying damage

all-modules.title: Module Management+
all-modules.description: Is packed with features and design improvements designed to make managing large module list easy. MM+ provides more detailed information about modules at a glance and allows you to read packages changelogs/readmes directly in foundry meant to help you find answers quickly. Some of the notable features of Module Management+ is the Addition of new tags such as readme, changelog, issues and authors. A cleaner easier list view of the modules with stripped rows and more spacing to make the viewing experiance easier on the eyes. The ability to see conflicts and known issues with your installed modules.

conflicts.reason: Tidy UI and MM+ perform many of the same functions. MM+ will not be fixing compatibility issues between the two modules.
Changelog & Conflicts is deprecated and the author recommends you use Module Management+ instead.

optional.reason: Provides a compatibility layer for checking if other Modules are overriding similar functionality.
Provides the ability to apply optional styles for a more modern and clean look.

all-modules.title: Monk's Active Tile Triggers
all-modules.description: Want to teleport, or open doors, or hide characters, or display a message, or play a sound, or change a token's elevation when a token walks over a tile... now you can

all-modules.title: Monk's Little Details
all-modules.description: Things to tidy up the interface and flow

all-modules.title: Monk's Player Settings
all-modules.description: Allow the GM to change player settings and sync client setings between browsers

all-modules.title: Monk's Sound Enhancements
all-modules.description: You can now see what sound files are included in the compendium playlists, preview each file, and then drag and drop individual files.  And if you want to import the play list, you can now select individual files to include in the import, rather than importing the entire list.

all-modules.title: Monk's TokenBar
all-modules.description: Add a bar with all the current player tokens.  Limit movement, roll saving throws, assign XP.

all-modules.title: Moulinette Core
all-modules.description: Moulinette provides multiple tools and assets for DMs (dungeon masters) to help them prepare their games.

all-modules.title: Moulinette Image Search (module)
all-modules.description: This module for Moulinette adds capabilities for searching images and generating articles on the fly.

all-modules.title: Moulinette Scenes (module)
all-modules.description: This module for Moulinette adds capabilities for downloading scenes from the community.

all-modules.title: Moulinette Sounds & SoundPad (module)
all-modules.description: This module for Moulinette adds capabilities for managing your sounds and create a soundpad.

all-modules.title: Moulinette Tiles (module)
all-modules.description: This module for Moulinette adds capabilities for downloading tiles and adding them to your scenes.

all-modules.title: Mass Edit
all-modules.description: Search and edit multiple placeables at the same time.

all-modules.title: Nice more Dice
all-modules.description: Adds a bunch of dice textures and dice faces to DsN.

all-modules.title: Perfect Vision
all-modules.description: Lighting Drawings and Vision Limitation.

all-modules.title: Polyglot
all-modules.description: Talk to others using a language you can speak and scrambles text you can't understand, in several fantasy scripts.

all-modules.title: Quick Insert - Search Widget
all-modules.description:
Quickly find actors, items, spells etc. and insert them wherever you need them right now - the map, character sheets, roll tables, journals, you name it.
  • Open with Ctrl + Space (default)
  • Hold Shift to select more than one result
  • Drag and drop directly from the search results

all-modules.title: Rest Recovery for 5E
all-modules.description: Adds 5e long and short rest mechanics and variant rules, such as feats, class features, and hit-dice healing.

all-modules.title: Library: Scene Packer
all-modules.description: A module to assist with Scene and Adventure packing and unpacking.

all-modules.title: Sequencer
all-modules.description: This module allows you to play effects on the canvas, and create complex sequences of actions

all-modules.title: Settings Extender
all-modules.description: Extends the settings menu, adding additional types for configuration values.

all-modules.title: Simbul's Athenaeum
all-modules.description: A library for use by other Simbul modules. Useless by it's own.

all-modules.title: Simbul's Cover Calculator
all-modules.description: A module that handles Cover Calculations for DnD 5e. Originally part of DnD 5e Helpers, split out for v10.

all-modules.title: Simbul's Creature Aide
all-modules.description: A module that handles Legendary Actions, Lair Actions and Ability Recharges for DnD5e. Originally part of DnD 5e Helpers, split out for v10.

all-modules.title: Smart Target
all-modules.description: Enhancements for the targeting feature

all-modules.title: Sane Magical Item Prices Compendium
all-modules.description: This is an implementation of the Sane Magical Item Prices PDF

all-modules.title: socketlib
all-modules.description: A library for easier handling of foundry sockets

all-modules.title: Tabletop RPG Music
all-modules.description: A free and evergrowing collection of Fantasy and Sci Fi tracks for Foundry users. Support me on Patreon to help me keep writing!

all-modules.title: Tagger
all-modules.description: A global tags manager for easy manipulation of objects of similar types

all-modules.title: Terrain Ruler
all-modules.description: Adds a ruler tool that allows you to measure distances taking difficult terrain (provided by the terrain layer module) into account.

all-modules.title: The Griffon's Saddlebag, Pack 2021-10
all-modules.description: A module containing the 2021-10 set of items from The Griffon's Saddlebag Ledger+

all-modules.title: Tidy5e Sheet
all-modules.description: Replaces the default D&D 5e character and NPC sheet with an alternate layout focused on a cleaner UI

all-modules.title: Times Up
all-modules.description: Active expiry expiration

all-modules.title: Token Action HUD
all-modules.description: Creates a HUD showing a selected token's common actions.

optional.reason: To set colors within this module's settings. If both modules are enabled, Token Action HUD will use color-picker
To set colors within this module's settings. If both modules are enabled, Token Action HUD will use color-picker

all-modules.title: Token Attacher
all-modules.description: Attach anything(even tokens) to tokens, so that they move when the token moves and rotate/move when the token rotates. Create prefabs and many more features, see the github readme for more details.

all-modules.title: Token Ease
all-modules.description: This module enhances native Foundry behavior by exposing easing, custom movement speed, and movement duration in the token configuration.

all-modules.title: Token Lean: Peek Around Corners
all-modules.description: Want to look around corners without moving your token? Stack up on a door and peek around? Just lean!

all-modules.title: Token Variant Art
all-modules.description: Searches a customizable list of directories and displays art variants for tokens/actors through pop-ups and a new Token HUD button. Variants can be individually shared with players allowing them to switch out their token art on the fly.

all-modules.title: Token Z
all-modules.description: Easly manage the Z-Index of tokens

all-modules.title: Token Magic FX
all-modules.description: Add special effects and animations on your tokens, tiles, drawings and templates.

all-modules.title: Wall Height
all-modules.description: Adds the ability to set wall height for walls so that tokens can look and move over them.

all-modules.title: Warp Gate
all-modules.description: Utility module for spawning and modifying tokens.

all-modules.title: World Scripter
all-modules.description: Allow you to write a script in game which executes as if it was a world script.

all-modules.title: Library: Chat Commands
all-modules.description: Allows for easy registration of custom chat commands such as /command
